languages.text: "Они думают, что за угрозами могут укрыть {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}бесчестье{/d} {rt_mf|своего|своей} {rt_mf|господина|госпожи}?" {n}Желчь, исторгнутая изо рта Гнили, шипит на умах рабочих, словно кислота. Прожигает их.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Они думают, что за угрозами могут укрыть {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}бесчестье{/d} {rt_mf|своего|своей} {rt_mf|господина|госпожи}?" {n}Желчь, исторгнутая изо рта Гнили, шипит на умах рабочих, словно кислота. Прожигает их.{/n}

languages.text: "Do they think they can hide their {rt_mf|master|mistress}'s {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrace{/d} behind such threats?" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

languages.text: "Denken sie, sie können die {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}Schande{/d} {rt_mf|ihres Meisters|ihrer Meisterin} hinter derartigen Drohungen verbergen?" {n}Der Geifer aus Fäules Mund sickert wie Säure in den Verstand der Arbeiter. Er brennt sich förmlich durch sie.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Denken sie, sie können die {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}Schande{/d} {mf|ihres Meisters|ihrer Meisterin} hinter derartigen Drohungen verbergen?" {n}Der Geifer aus Mehltaus Mund sickert wie Säure in den Verstand der Arbeiter. Er brennt sich förmlich durch sie.{/n}

languages.text: « Pensez-vous vraiment qu'il leur soit possible de camoufler la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrâce{/d} de leur {rt_mf|maître|maîtresse} derrière leurs vaines menaces ? »{n}La bile que crache Pourriture s'insinue dans les esprits des ouvriers, rongeant leurs pensées comme de l'acide, brûlant l'essence même de leurs pensées.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do they think they can hide their {rt_mf|master|mistress}'s {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrace{/d} behind such threats?" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pensez-vous vraiment qu'il leur soit possible de camoufler la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrâce{/d} de leur {mf|maître|maîtresse} derrière leurs vaines menaces ? »{n}La bile que crache Moisissure s'insinue dans les esprits des ouvriers, rongeant leurs pensées comme de l'acide, brûlant l'essence même de leurs pensées.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Creen que pueden ocultar la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}desgracia{/d} de su {rt_mf|amo|ama} con esas amenazas?». {n}La bilis de la voz de Podredumbre corroe las mentes de los trabajadores como si fuera ácido. Permea completamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do they think they can hide their {rt_mf|master|mistress}'s {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrace{/d} behind such threats?" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Creen que pueden ocultar la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}desgracia{/d} de su {mf|amo|ama} con esas amenazas?». {n}La bilis de la voz de Moho corroe las mentes de los trabajadores como si fuera ácido. Permea completamente.{/n}

languages.text: 「彼らはそのような脅しで、主人の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}不名誉{/d}を隠せると思っているのか？」{n}ロットの口から噴き出す胆汁が、酸のように労働者たちの精神を焼く。そして、彼らは焼き尽くされる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do they think they can hide their {rt_mf|master|mistress}'s {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrace{/d} behind such threats?" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「彼らはそのような脅しで、主人の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}不名誉{/d}を隠せると思っているのか？」{n}白カビの口から噴き出す胆汁が、酸のように労働者たちの精神を焼く。そして、彼らは焼き尽くされる。{/n}

languages.text: “莫非他们以为，只凭这样的威胁，就能掩盖他们主人{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}可耻{/d}的勾当吗？”{n}“脓疮”嘴里喷出的毒液，仿佛酸液一样在工人们的头脑中嘶嘶作响，将他们烧得通红。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do they think they can hide their {rt_mf|master|mistress}'s {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrace{/d} behind such threats?" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “莫非他们以为，只凭这样的威胁，就能掩盖他们主人的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}耻辱{/d}吗？”{n}“霉毯”嘴里喷出的毒液，仿佛酸液一样在工人们的头脑中嘶嘶作响，将他们烧得通红。{/n}

languages.text: "Efendilerinin {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}utancını{/d} böyle tehditlerin ardına saklayabileceklerini mi düşünüyorlar?" {n}Çürük'ün dudaklarından yayılan kin, işçilerin zihinlerini asit misali öfkeyle doldurarak onları içten içe yakıyor.{/n}
